      static void clear_all_tabs()
      Clears all tabs.
      static void clear_tab()
      Clears tab at the current position.
      static void cursor_backward(int count)
      Moves the cursor backward by COUNT columns; the default count is 1.
      static void cursor_down(int count)
      Moves the cursor down by COUNT rows; the default count is 1.

      Moves the cursor forward by COUNT columns; the default count is 1.
      static void cursor_home(int row, int column)
      Sets the cursor position where subsequent text will begin.

      Moves the cursor up by COUNT rows; the default count is 1.
      static void disable_line_wrap()
      Disables line wrapping.
      static void enable_line_wrap()
      Text wraps to next line if longer than the length of the display area.
      static void enable_screen_scroll()
      Enable scrolling for entire display.
      static void erase_down()
      Erases the screen from the current line down to the bottom of the screen.
      static void erase_end_of_line()
      Erases from the current cursor position to the end of the current line.
      static void erase_line()
      Erases the entire current line.
      static void erase_screen()
      Erases the screen with the background colour and moves the cursor to home.
      static void erase_start_of_line()
      Erases from the current cursor position to the start of the current line.
      static void erase_up()
      Erases the screen from the current line up to the top of the screen.

      Set default font.
      static void font_set_g1()
      Set alternate font.

      Identical to Cursor Home.
      static void print_line()
      Print the current line.
      static void print_screen()
      Print the current screen.
      static void query_cursor_position()
      Requests a Report Cursor Position response from the device.
      static void query_device_code()
      Requests a Report Device Code response from the device.
      static void query_device_status()
      Requests a Report Device Status response from the device.
      static void report_cursor_position()
      Generated by the device in response to a Query Cursor Position request; reports current cursor position.
      static void report_device_code(int code)
      Generated by the device in response to Query Device Code request.
      static void report_device_failure()
      Generated by the device in response to a Query Device Status request; indicates that device is functioning improperly.
      static void report_device_ok()
      Generated by the device in response to a Query Device Status request; indicates that device is functioning correctly.
      static void reset_device()
      Reset all terminal settings to default.
      static void restore_cursor_attrs()
      Restores cursor position after a Save Cursor.
      static void save_cursor_attrs()
      Save current cursor position.

      Scroll display down one line.

      Enable scrolling from row {start} to row {end}.
      static void scroll_up()
      Scroll display up one line.
      static void set_tab()
      Sets a tab at the current position.
      static void start_print_log()
      Start log; all received text is echoed to a printer.
      static void stop_print_log()
      Disable log.
      static void unsave_cursor()
      Restores cursor position after a Save Cursor.

      • cursor_home

        public static void cursor_home(int row,
                               int column)
        Sets the cursor position where subsequent text will begin. If no row/column parameters are provided (ie. <ESC>[H), the cursor will move to the home position, at the upper left of the screen.
